title: Week 3 Preview: NFC Title Contenders Square Off, Herbert vs. Mahomes, and the Rest of the Week 3 Slate
description:
Benjamin, Kaelen, and Steven start by discussing an important matchup in the NFC between the Buccaneers and the Rams (3:00). Then they discuss the AFC West battle between the Chargers and Chiefs. Then they move on to some other important games, like Packers-49ers and the Saints playing on the road against the Patriots (23:00). As always, they wrap up with Gimme a Reason and briefly talk about the rest of the Week 3 games (49:29).

Hosts: Benjamin Solak, Kaelen Jones, and Steven Ruiz
Producer: Christopher Sutton
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
